name: ess!cape
description:
Imagine food would be alive and imagine you are the food.   So what would happen if human buy you at the supermarked and wanna eat you?

In ess!cape you´re playing the little carrot named Joshi. You know you´ll die at the humans kitchen, so  you wanna escape from the kitchen and want to warn your food friends at the supermarked about the humans.

Features:

  • search your way trough the kitchen and the supermarked
  • search for the gold coins to get to the next level
  • collect as most possible silver coins as fast as you can to increase your highscore
  • pots and jello will give you  a boost on jumps

Controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMoveA + DLeft Stick or Dpad Left + Right
JumpSpaceButton SouthFall (trough platforms and fringes)SLeft Stick or Dpad DownHold on fringesWButton WestControllsF1SelectMove CamArrowkeysRight  Stick
